survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Corporate Wellness Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with current corporate wellness programs and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for dropdown or radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which wellness programs do you currently participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option if space allows for additional responses.

script.question_text: Which wellness programs do you currently participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in corporate wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Ensure answer options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in corporate wellness programs?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in corporate wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q4
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in corporate wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q4
